tasks.title: Multi-Image Upload - Third Image Gets Stuck in Queue
tasks.description: When uploading 3 images via photo album in Structural Systems, 2 images sync but the 3rd sits in queue indefinitely. Force sync shows 'uploading' briefly then returns to queue/idle. Pattern: 2 images work, 3+ causes 1 to get stuck. With 4 images, 3 sync and 1 stuck.
acceptance_criteria: All images in multi-image upload sync successfully
No images get stuck in queue after partial sync
Force sync successfully syncs queued items
tasks.suspected_cause: Race condition during batch upload. Sync worker may skip items if previous ones processing. Possible duplicate prevention incorrectly filtering valid images.

tasks.title: Elevation Plot Rooms Infinite Loading - Performance Issue
tasks.description: Elevation plot rooms show loading screen and never finish loading. Pages should load faster with local-only data (offline experience). Need optimization while ensuring images sustain, captions persist, no functionality breaks.
acceptance_criteria: Elevation plot rooms load quickly (under 2 seconds)
Images display correctly from local storage
tasks.technical_approach: Profile bottlenecks. Optimize LocalImages queries. Defer non-critical loading. Lazy load images. ONLY change if confident won't break persistence.
tasks.safety_constraint: DO NOT change if not confident about image sustainability. Prioritize reliability over speed.

tasks.title: Optimize Image Thumbnail Loading in Elevation Plot Rooms
tasks.description: Image thumbnails in elevation plot rooms should load faster. With local-first approach, thumbnails should display nearly instantly since data is on device.
acceptance_criteria: Progressive loading - show visible thumbnails first
No functionality breakage - images sustain, captions persist
tasks.technical_approach: Use thumbnail-sized blobs. Implement progressive/lazy loading. Batch blob URL generation. Cache URLs.
tasks.safety_constraint: Only change if confident won't break image sustainability.
